indications.text: gabapentin capsules indicated : management postherpetic neuralgia adults adjunctive therapy treatment partial onset seizures , without secondary generalization , adults pediatric patients 3 years older epilepsy

contraindications.text: postherpetic neuralgia ( 2.1 ) dose titrated needed dose 1800 mg/day day 1 : single 300 mg dose day 2 : 600 mg/day ( i.e . , 300 mg two times day ) day 3 : 900 mg/day ( i.e . , 300 mg three times day ) epilepsy partial onset seizures ( 2.2 ) patients 12 years age older : starting dose 300 mg three times daily ; may titrated 600 mg three times daily patients 3 11 years age : starting dose range 10 15mg/kg/day , given three divided doses ; recommended dose patients 3 4 years age 40 mg/kg/day , given three divided doses ; recommended dose patients 5 11 years age 25 35 mg/kg/day , given three divided doses . recommended dose reached upward titration period approximately 3 days dose adjusted patients reduced renal function ( 2.3 , 2.4 )

warningsAndPrecautions: 100 mg capsules : opaque white cap opaque white body imprinted 's617/100 mg ' cap edible blue ink strides logo body edible green ink . filled white white powder ; available : bottles 100 : ndc 23155-866-01 bottles 500 : ndc 23155-866-05 bottles 1000 : ndc 23155-866-10 300 mg capsules : opaque yellow cap opaque yellow body imprinted 's618/300 mg ' cap edible blue ink strides logo body edible green ink . filled white white powder ; available : bottles 100 : ndc 23155-867-01 bottles 500 : ndc 23155-867-05 bottles 1000 : ndc 23155-867-10 400 mg capsules : opaque orange cap opaque orange body imprinted 's619/400 mg ' cap edible blue ink strides logo body edible green ink . filled white white powder ; available : bottles 100 : ndc 23155-868-01 bottles 500 : ndc 23155-868-05 bottles 1000 : ndc 23155-868-10 store gabapentin capsules 25°c ( 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15°c 30°c ( 59°f 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . dispense contents tight , light-resistant container defined usp child-resistant closure ; required . keep container tightly closed keep medication reach children .
adverseReactions: gabapentin capsules contraindicated patients demonstrated hypersensitivity ingredients .
organization: Heritage Pharmaceuticals Inc. d/b/a Avet Pharmaceuticals Inc.
name: GABAPENTIN
indications_original:
Gabapentin capsules are indicated for:
                  
                     Management      of postherpetic neuralgia in adults
                     Adjunctive therapy in      the treatment of partial onset seizures, with and without secondary      generalization, in adults and pediatric patients 3 years and older with      epilepsy
contraindications_original: Postherpetic      Neuralgia (2.1) Dose      can be titrated up as needed to a dose of 1800 mg/day Day      1: Single 300 mg dose Day      2: 600 mg/day (i.e., 300 mg two times a day) Day      3: 900 mg/day (i.e., 300 mg three times a day) Epilepsy      with Partial Onset Seizures (2.2) Patients      12 years of age and older: starting dose is 300 mg three times daily; may      be titrated up to 600 mg three times daily Patients      3 to 11 years of age: starting dose range is 10 to 15mg/kg/day, given in      three divided doses; recommended dose in patients 3 to 4 years of age is      40 mg/kg/day, given in three divided doses; the recommended dose in      patients 5 to 11 years of age is 25 to 35 mg/kg/day, given in three      divided doses. The recommended dose is reached by upward titration over a      period of approximately 3 days Dose      should be adjusted in patients with reduced renal function (2.3, 2.4)
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
100 mg capsules:
                  Opaque white cap and opaque white body imprinted with 'S617/100 mg' on cap with edible blue ink and strides logo on body with edible green ink. Filled with white to off white powder; available in:
                  Bottles of 100: NDC 23155-866-01
                  Bottles of 500: NDC 23155-866-05
                  Bottles of 1000: NDC 23155-866-10
                  300 mg capsules:
                  Opaque yellow cap and opaque yellow body imprinted with 'S618/300 mg' on cap with edible blue ink and strides logo on body with edible green ink. Filled with white to off white powder; available in:
                  Bottles of 100: NDC 23155-867-01
                  Bottles of 500: NDC 23155-867-05
                  Bottles of 1000: NDC 23155-867-10
                  400 mg capsules:
                  Opaque orange cap and opaque orange body imprinted with 'S619/400 mg' on cap with edible blue ink and strides logo on body with edible green ink. Filled with white to off white powder; available in:
                  Bottles of 100: NDC 23155-868-01
                  Bottles of 500: NDC 23155-868-05
                  Bottles of 1000: NDC 23155-868-10
                  Store Gabapentin Capsules at 25°C (77°F); excursions permitted between 15°C to 30°C (59°F to 86°F) [See USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  Dispense contents in a tight, light-resistant container as defined in the USP with a child-resistant closure; as required.
                  KEEP CONTAINER TIGHTLY CLOSED
                  
                     KEEP THIS AND ALL MEDICATION OUT OF THE REACH OF CHILDREN.
adverseReactions_original: Gabapentin capsules are contraindicated in patients who have demonstrated hypersensitivity to the drug or its ingredients.
